document.full_text: apple inc has completed work on an online music storage service and is set to launch it ahead of google inc, whose own music efforts have stalled, according to several people familiar with both companies' plans.
document.title: exclusive: apple to beat google on cloud music: sources
lines_and_colors: apple inc has completed work on an online music storage service and is set to launch it ahead of google inc, whose own music efforts have stalled, according to several people familiar with both companies' plans.
